class.name: SxOS.DirOrFile
class.description: Represents a path: a directory or a file.

method.name: is_file
method.description: Check if the path is a file.

method.name: is_directory
method.description: Check if the path is a file.

method.name: set_window_size_str
method.description:
Set the current window size from a "WIDTHxHEIGHT" string.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- SxOS.set_window_size_str("1280x720") ----

method.name: is_mobile
method.description:
Detect if the current system is a mobile environment.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- if SxOS.is_mobile(): print("I'm on a mobile!") ----

method.name: is_web
method.description:
Detect if the current system is a Web environment.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- if SxOS.is_web(): print("I'm on a browser!") ----

method.name: list_files_in_directory
method.description:
List all files in a directory. + The `filters` argument is used to ignore some patterns. + It returns an array of <<_sxos_dirorfile>>.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- var files_and_dirs = SxOS.list_files_in_directory("user://my_folder", []): ----
